<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GLTFSkeleton_method_get_godot_bone_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_godot_bone_node**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GLTFSkeleton_method_get_godot_bone_node)

Returns a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) that maps skeleton bone indices to the indices of glTF nodes. This property is unused during import, and only set during export. In a glTF file, a bone is a node, so Redot converts skeleton bones to glTF nodes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GLTFSkeleton_method_get_godot_skeleton"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GLTFSkeleton_method_set_godot_bone_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_godot_bone_node**\ (\ godot_bone_node\: [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GLTFSkeleton_method_set_godot_bone_node)

Sets a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) that maps skeleton bone indices to the indices of glTF nodes. This property is unused during import, and only set during export. In a glTF file, a bone is a node, so Redot converts skeleton bones to glTF nodes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">
